text: BCIT offers over 300 programs and 1000 part-time courses in 6 general areas of study. Search or browse our catalogues to find the right fit for the next step in your career.
**Design a better tomorrow.** More than ever, the world needs leaders to find new approaches to complex issues that affect our way of life.
**Prepare to lead.** Today, those who achieve success in business are those who can embrace change and adapt as it happens.
**Shape the future of tech.** BCIT grads are shaping the tech industry online and around the world.

**Invent creative solutions.** Whether they’re making it faster, smarter, or more economical, engineers are responsible for imagining solutions to complex problems across a range of exciting industries.
**Care for those around you.** Healthcare professionals are at the heart of our communities—improving the quality of life for all and providing care for our most vulnerable.
**Build a solid foundation.** Pursuing a career in trades at BCIT means you can build the future you imagine.
Learning options to suit your schedule
Take a full set of courses that lead towards your career goal. Once accepted, you’re automatically registered into all the courses you need.

Choose to enrol in [apprenticeship training](https://www.bcit.ca/admission/how-to-apply/apprenticeship-applicants/) or [co-op education](https://www.bcit.ca/workplace-education/) for on-the-job experience while you study.
Select the courses you want to take, in your time. There’s plenty of flexibility, with evening and weekend courses to suit your schedule.
Many courses offer a [distance & online learning](https://www.bcit.ca/flexible-learning/distance-online-learning/) option so you can study from home or at the office.
The 2024/2025 Future Student Guide provides you with the practical information you’re looking for, including how to apply and where you can find out more about our programs and services.
